scripts.build: npm run build:systemjs && npm run build:sjs && npm run min && npm run build:extras
scripts.min: npm run min:systemjs && npm run min:sjs
scripts.min:systemjs: cd dist && terser system.js -c passes=2 -m --source-map --comments "/SystemJS \d/" -o system.min.js
scripts.min:sjs: cd dist && terser s.js -c passes=2 -m --source-map -o s.min.js
scripts.footprint: npm run footprint:systemjs && npm run footprint:sjs
